name: Save Samuel
description:
Ahh.. so it’s, um, June 9th… It’s been may, 72 hours since the strike? The blast took out the city center. Few towers left standing. The Talaski faction claimed it, but I think that’s bull - none knows what hit us. People are dying everywhere. Not from injuries though, they’re just dropping like flies for no reason. Never seen anything like it. but I’m beginning to think its… something else. Dunno if I’m gonna die too. I’ll hold out another day here, see if things calm down a bit… But yeah… Not looking good.

You must recover for the Artifacts that Samuel left behind… Each one brings you closer to finding Samuel. Good luck.

Our game is a third person shooter set to a mystery to discover what happened to our world, who Samuel is, and why he needs saving. Part of our take on the theme was to start with no context.

Enjoy!

Controls: Mouse to Look Around WASD for Movement Space to Jump Hold Left Shift to Sprint Right click Aims Left click Fires

Credits:

Voice acting, Music and Sound by Benjamin DenDulk

Programing and Animation by Harley Bekker

Models and Visuals by Jake Bekker
